Text:
I actually found the .nfo file on an nfo site, made it into a text file,and it worked! The old torrent is now at 100%, and you and I rescued a bunch of stuck peers.

Thank you for posting this! I wish more people would rescue dead torrents. I've done it many times now.

just wanted to say hi after what you said about "You young whippersnappers may not have ever seen real breasts or pubic hair, so you might want to D/L one of these classics just to see what life was like before iPads. "
